files.description: Creates the /outputs directory scaffold with required subfolders and generates /outputs/README.md plus placeholder templates with acceptance criteria for goal_1 and goal_2.
Indexes all deliverables under /outputs and documents where to find simulation, compliance, ops, models, and tests artifacts along with pointers to goal_1 and goal_2 placeholders.
Ensures the /outputs directory is tracked in version control even when empty.
Ensures the /outputs/models directory exists for model-related deliverables.
Ensures the /outputs/compliance directory exists for compliance and traceability artifacts.
Ensures the /outputs/ops directory exists for operational runbooks and execution artifacts.
Ensures the /outputs/sim directory exists for simulation runs and results packs.
Ensures the /outputs/tests directory exists for test plans, matrices, and test evidence.
Placeholder template defining contents and acceptance criteria for goal_1 (simulation results pack) including required files, metadata, and validation checklist.
Placeholder template defining contents and acceptance criteria for goal_2 (test matrix + design rules) including coverage expectations and review checklist.

missionDescription: Create /outputs/README.md indexing all deliverables, plus a minimal directory scaffold (e.g., /outputs/models, /outputs/compliance, /outputs/ops, /outputs/sim, /outputs/tests) and placeholders with acceptance criteria for goal_1 (simulation results pack) and goal_2 (test matrix + design rules).
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete the urgent task identified by Meta-Coordinator

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Closes the 'deliverables audit gap' by converting completed research/planning into a repo-ready artifact set, enabling execution (sharing, versioning, stakeholder review) and serving as the foundation...
projectName: /outputs/README.md indexing all deliverables, plus a minimal directory scaffold (e.g., /outputs/models, /outputs/compliance, /outputs/ops, /outputs/sim, /outputs/tests) and placeholders with acceptance criteria for goal_1 (simulation results pack) and goal_2 (test matrix + design rules).
